criteria: Identification of Author and Illustrator and Definition of Roles
descriptions: The student cannot identify the author or illustrator of the text.
The student can identify either the author or the illustrator, but not both.
The student can identify both the author and the illustrator but cannot define their roles.
The student can identify the author and illustrator and provides a vague or partially inaccurate description of their roles.
The student accurately identifies the author and illustrator and describes their roles with some detail, but may have minor inaccuracies or omissions.

The student accurately identifies the author and illustrator and thoroughly explains the role each plays in presenting the ideas or information in the text, demonstrating a clear understanding of their contributions.
